author: Mercer
description: Harumasa is an S rank Agent with the <elec> Electric attribute who belongs to the Attack Specialty and who is part of the Section 6 faction.

weapons.name: Zanshin Herb Case
weapons.description: BIS W-Engine, gives a near 100% uptime on 20 <cr> Crit Rate when needed, on top of its <cd> Crit Damage Main Stat while providing a massive 40% <elec> Electric DMG Bonus to his Dash Attacks, his main source of damage.

weapons.name: Any S Rank Crit Rate W-Engine
weapons.description: Any <cr> Crit Rate Main Stat and high Base <atk> ATK W-Engine will be good due to Yixuan's passive <atk> ATK stat conversion, even with no passive from the W-Engine itself

weapons.name: The Brimstone
weapons.description: Best Non-Limited S Rank W-Engine, gives an insane amount of <atk> ATK due to its Main Stat while also providing insane in-combat <atk> ATK%

four_pieces.name: Shadow Harmony
four_pieces.description:
4-Pc Shadow Harmony is the most consistent due to it not being reliant on Shock anomaly or Hormone Punk's uptime to do the most damage. The set gives everything Harumasa needs on top of its near 100% uptime. At max stacks (which will be surely after your burst starts) you will gain:
15% Dash Attack DMG Bonus 12% Combat <atk> ATK Boost 12% <cr> Crit Rate
The other sets have their uses in Mono-shock team and/or Shiyu Defense Speedrun.

four_pieces.name: Hormone Punk
four_pieces.description:
The best 4-Pc set for high burst DMG builds outside of Rina Mono Shock Teams, on top of its 2-Pc 10% <atk> ATK bonus it grants a massive 25% Combat <atk> ATK Bonus when swapped on field when it's not on cooldown for 10 seconds.
Especially the best when you do not need the Crit boost from 4-Pc Shadow Harmony to reach 100%~ <cr> Crit Rate with Dash Attacks.

two_pieces.name: Branch & Blade Song / Woodpecker Electro
two_pieces.description: The two best 2-Pc options for Harumasa. Always being a damage increase, but your pick will depend on if you have her signature or not.

extra_sections.title: Note for Harumasa Stats
extra_sections.description:
ATK% Disc 5 is better than Elec% Disc 5, especially with his Signature giving him bonus Elec% on Dash attack. A good Elec% disc can still outperform a bad ATK% disc, so it is recommended to pick the disc with the best sub stats.
His Enhanced Dash Attack gets 25% Crit Rate bonus, making the max Crit Rate 75%, further reduced by 12% from 4-Pc Shadow Harmony, 15% from M6 Nicole, 20% from Signature W-Engine, and more depending on the setup.

main_stats.stat_priority: <atk> ATK% > <elec> Electric DMG% / PEN% when running a Rina team

stat.sub_stats: Crit Rate% (until 75%/63%(Shadow Harmony)/48%(Shadow Harmony + Nicole) /28%(Shadow Harmony + Nicole + Signature W-Engine) Build Breakpoints) > Crit DMG% = ATK%
stat.baseline_stats:
<atk> ATK Main Engine: 2800-3300+
Non <atk> ATK Main Engine: 2700-3000+
<cr> Crit Rate%
4-Pc Shadow Harmony: 38-63%
Otherwise: 50-75%
<cd> Crit DMG%: 150-200%+
(Range Dependent on Team, Disc 5 and Engine)

skill_priority.description: Dash Attacks are his main source of damage but his Ultimate/Chain Attack and EX Special can contribute to damage

skills.title: Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash
skills.description:
While there are X-Marked enemies on the field, Harumasa will enter the Awakened state, switching Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru for Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash.
Rush forwards to the closest X-Marked enemy and execute a powerful slash, dealing <elec> Electric DMG. When the slash hits the target, it consumes 2 stacks of Electro Prison. repeatedly press DASH ATTACK to repeatedly use Dash Attack: Hiten no Tsuru - Slash.
skills.explanation: Best used during the stun window due to Harumasa dealing 40% more DMG to stunned or anomaly inflicted enemies

mindscapes.description: Harumasa's M1 is a great extender for his burst dps windows allowing more stacks from your basic attack and your quivers shooting another arrow at the target. Allowing for some lethal setups with increased stacks and marks on the opponent. It is also a good mindscape for On-field Harumasa as it extends his dash attack combo further.

extra_sections.title: General Notes on Team Building
extra_sections.description: Rina is only recommended at M1 due to it increasing the field time of her puppets, making her <pen> PEN buff stay longer
